SEARCH
Package musiclibrary

Class MusicLibrary

java.lang.Object
musiclibrary.MusicLibrary
public class MusicLibrary extends Object
A simple music library class that allows for the management of songs in a library with view capabilities for all songs and filtered by artist.

    • viewArtistSongs

      Prints a 2-column view of the music library of only the artist specified by the user
      Parameters:
      library - the two-dimensional array containing songs and artists
      sc - the scanner to read from

    • addSong

      public static String[][] addSong(String[][] library, Scanner sc)
      Allows the user to add a song and artist to the library
      Parameters:
      library - the two-dimensional array containing songs and artists
      sc - the scanner to read from
      Returns:
      the updated library

    • updateSong

      public static void updateSong(String[][] library, Scanner sc)
      Allows the user to update a song's details given its song. If there are multiple artists with the same song, then the artist is asked for clarification.
      Parameters:
      library - the two-dimensional array containing songs and artists
      sc - the scanner to read from

      The main method
